data.name: Common_AppTitle
data.comment: Application title used throughout the interface

data.name: Common_FolderBrowserDescription
data.value: Choose where ye want t' stash th' plunder
data.comment: Description shown in the folder browser dialog

data.name: MainForm_Title
data.comment: Main window title bar title

data.name: MainForm_WindowTitleWithVersion
data.comment: Main window title with version number. {0} = version string

data.name: MainForm_VersionLabel
data.comment: Version label text. {0} = version string

data.name: MainForm_VersionPrefix
data.comment: Static version label prefix

data.name: Error_GenericMessage
data.value: Blimey! The ship's hit a squall! Here be th' details:
data.comment: Generic error message shown in error dialog

data.name: Error_RetryDialogTitle
data.value: Shall we give it another go, matey?
data.comment: Error retry dialog title with Yes/No buttons

data.name: Connected_StatusLabel
data.comment: Status label in connected state

data.name: Connected_ReportCountSingular
data.comment: Label showing report count (singular). {0} = number of reports

data.name: Connected_ReportCountPlural
data.comment: Label showing report count (plural). {0} = number of reports

data.name: Connected_FetchButton
data.comment: Button to download reports from Quest device

data.name: Connected_ViewButton
data.comment: Button to open file explorer to reports folder

data.name: Connected_SettingsButton
data.comment: Button to open settings dialog

data.name: Disconnected_StepNumber1
data.comment: Step number for first instruction

data.name: Disconnected_StepNumber2
data.comment: Step number for second instruction

data.name: Disconnected_Instruction1
data.value: Make sure yer Quest contraption be tethered t' yer PC with a USB-C rope
data.comment: First setup instruction. USB-C is a technical term.

data.name: Disconnected_Instruction2
data.value: Check in yer spyglass fer a prompt t' trust th' PC: mark "always allow this landlubber's machine" an' click OK
data.comment: Second setup instruction. "in the headset" refers to the VR headset display

data.name: Loading_StatusLabel
data.comment: Status label in loading state

data.name: Loading_StatusNoReports
data.value: No treasure found in th' hold
data.comment: Status when no reports exist on device

data.name: Loading_StatusDownloading
data.comment: Status during active download

data.name: Loading_StatusComplete
data.comment: Status when download finishes successfully

data.name: Loading_StatusFailed
data.value: Shiver me timbers! The haulin' failed!
data.comment: Status when download encounters an error (displayed in red/bold)

data.name: Settings_WindowTitle
data.comment: Settings dialog window title

data.name: Settings_ReportsPathLabel
data.comment: Label for reports path textbox. "Remote" = on the Quest device

data.name: Settings_ArchivePathLabel
data.comment: Label for archive path textbox. "Remote" = on the Quest device

data.name: Settings_OutputPathLabel
data.comment: Label for output folder textbox. "Local" = on this PC

data.name: Settings_LanguageLabel
data.comment: Label for language dropdown

data.name: Settings_BrowseButton
data.comment: Button to open folder browser dialog

data.name: Settings_SaveButton
data.comment: Button to save settings and close dialog

data.name: Settings_CancelButton
data.comment: Button to close dialog without saving

data.name: Settings_FolderBrowserDescription
data.value: Choose where ye want t' stash th' plunder
data.comment: Description shown in the folder browser dialog

data.name: Settings_RestartMessage
data.value: Ye'll need t' restart th' ship fer the new tongue t' take effect, savvy?
data.comment: MessageBox notification after language change

data.name: Settings_RestartTitle
data.comment: MessageBox title for restart notification

data.name: Menu_File
data.comment: Main menu - File menu (Alt+F shortcut)

data.name: Menu_Settings
data.comment: File menu - Settings menu item (Alt+S shortcut)

data.name: Menu_Exit
data.comment: File menu - Exit menu item (Alt+A shortcut)
